channel.title: Atualizações ICAM - Prognóstico
channel.description: Sinopses de artigos científicos produzidas pela equipa ICAM.

item.title: A trombocitopénia está associada às apresentações graves da COVID-19 (meta-análise)
item.description: Thrombocytopenia is associated with severe coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) infections: A meta-analysis. Lippi, et al. Clinica chimica acta; international journal of clinical chemistry. | 13-Mar-2020

item.title: O nível da troponina cardíaca I aumenta significativamente em doentes com infeção grave por SARS-CoV-2 (meta-análise)
item.description: Cardiac troponin I in patients with coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19): Evidence from a meta-analysis. Lippi, et al. Progress in cardiovascular diseases. | 10-Mar-2020

item.title: Valor prognóstico da calcitonina na forma grave da COVID-19 (meta-análise)
item.description: Procalcitonin in patients with severe coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19): A meta-analysis. Lippi and Plebani. Clinica chimica acta; international journal of clinical chemistry. | Jun-2020

item.title: Rácio plaquetas/linfócitos: um novo indicador para o prognóstico na doença COVID-19?
item.description: Platelet-to-lymphocyte ratio is associated with prognosis in patients with coronavirus disease-19. Qu, et al. Journal of medical virology. | 17-Mar-2020

item.title: Achados radiológicos em TC torácica e prognóstico da evolução da doença: Score-TC
item.description: Association of radiologic findings with mortality of patients infected with 2019 novel coronavirus in Wuhan, China. Yuan, et al. PloS one. | 2020
